A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Corporate moviemaking. No soul. The special effects are dazzling but quickly become boring. The script is moronic. Rey learns how to become a Jedi in ten minutes.  Lame humor that at times made the movie seem like a Mel Brooks parody. Tedious\, badly written dialogue scenes that felt interminable. Deux ex machine solutions to plot jams. The Luke Skywalker double at the end is a cop out a d made me furious. Hated this movie\, but loved The Empire Strikes Back. Back when movies had a soul.
